details:
[23-Apr-2025 20:36:27 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

SELECT gateway, currency, SUM(total) AS totals, COUNT(order_id) AS counts FROM ( SELECT orders.id AS order_id, MAX(CASE WHEN meta_key = '_payment_method' THEN meta_value END) gateway, MAX(CASE WHEN meta_key = '_order_total' THEN meta_value END) total, MAX(CASE WHEN meta_key = '_order_currency' THEN meta_value END) currency FROM wp_posts orders LEFT JOIN wp_postmeta order_meta ON order_meta.post_id = orders.id WHERE orders.post_type = 'shop_order' AND orders.post_date_gmt >= 2025-01-23 20:36:27 AND orders.post_status in ( 'wc-completed', 'wc-processing', 'wc-refunded' ) AND meta_key in( '_payment_method','_order_total','_order_currency') GROUP BY orders.id ) order_gateways GROUP BY gateway, currency

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2.
